item.title: PINS
item.description: score:157 Chances: Pinterest is seeing a growing partnership with Amazon and strengthening advertising business, making it a standout stock for 2024, according to RBC. RBC Capital Markets analysts upgraded Pinterest to Outperform from Sector Perform and raised their price target on the stock, citing the companyâ€™s potential to benefit from impulse purchases and increased body representation on its platform.
